description.value:
This soft cotton bag has a drawstring of sinew and a jagged embroidery pattern around the mouth. Inside are a seemingly endless number of needle-sharp teeth.

Activate—Sow a Tooth 2 (manipulate, occult)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You cast forth a tooth from the bag, and where it lands, a skeleton springs up from the ground. This has the effect of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Phantasmal Minion], except the minion appears as a visible skeleton.

Activate—Fist Full of Fangs 2 (manipulate, occult)

Frequency once per day

Effect You draw a whole handful of teeth and cast them to the ground, casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Rouse Skeletons] as a 5th-rank spell (DC 30).
